                          Razor 1911 proudly presents:                       
                           Surviving Mars *Internal*                         
                            (C) Paradox Interactive                          
 
  Date: 2017-03-15                     Game Type :  Strategy                
  Size: 1 Disc                         Protection: -                        
 

 Game Notes 
 ~~~~~~~~~~
 Welcome Home! The time has come to stake your claim on the Red Planet and 
 build the first functioning human colonies on Mars! All you need are 
 supplies, oxygen, decades of training, experience with sandstorms, and a
 can-do attitude to discover the purpose of those weird black cubes that 
 appeared out of nowhere. With a bit of sprucing up, this place is going to
 be awesome!
 Surviving Mars is a sci-fi city builder all about colonizing Mars and
 surviving the process. Choose a space agency for resources and financial
 support before determining a location for your colony. Build domes and 
 infrastructure, research new possibilities and utilize drones to unlock
 more elaborate ways to shape and expand your settlement. Cultivate your 
 own food, mine minerals or just relax by the bar after a hard day's work.
 Most important of all, though, is keeping your colonists alive. Not an 
 easy task on a strange new planet.
 There will be challenges to overcome. Execute your strategy and improve your
 colony's chances of survival while unlocking the mysteries of this alien 
 world. Are you ready? Mars is waiting for you. 
 
 Our friends in CODEX released the basic version. For our friends we decided
 to bring a internal release with digital deluxe edition version
